format: A data frame with 2784 rows and 41 variables.
description:
Description
A subset of data on Major League Baseball teams from
Lahman's Baseball Database. The full dataset is available
in the Lahman R package.
title: Major League Baseball Teams Data.

parameters.league_id: League the team plays in with levels AL (American League) and NL (National League).
parameters.at_bats: Number of at bats during the season.
parameters.strikeouts_by_pitchers: Number of opponents who were struckout.
parameters.batters_hit_by_pitch: Number of batters hit by a pitch.
parameters.runs_scored: Number of runs scored during the season.
parameters.hits_allowed: Number of hits made by opponents.
parameters.hits: Number of hits during the season. Includes singles, doubles, triples and homeruns.
parameters.rank: Team's rank in their division at the end of the regular season.
parameters.opponents_runs_scored: Number of runs scored by opponents.
parameters.world_series_winner: Did the team win the World Series? Levels of Y (yes) and N (no).
parameters.complete_games: Number of games where a single pitcher played the entire game.
parameters.walks_allowed: Number of opponents who were walked.
parameters.wild_card_winner: Was the team a wild card winner. Levels of Y (yes) and N (no).
parameters.division_winner: Did the team win their division? Levels of Y (yes) and N (no).
parameters.caught_stealing: Number of base runners caught stealing.
parameters.league_winner: Did the team win their league? Levels of Y (yes) and N (no).
parameters.homeruns_allowed: Number of homeruns hit by opponents.
parameters.outs_pitches: Number of outs pitched for the season (number of innings pitched times 3).
parameters.division_id: Division the team plays in with levels W (west), E (east) and C (central).
